    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AppLogger
     
    CommandLineInterface
    Command line interface for the Secure File Manager application.
    CryptoException
    Exception thrown when a cryptography operation fails.
    CryptoService
     
    DatabaseConnection
     
    Encrypt
    Interface for encryption and decryption operations.
    FileAccessException
    Exception thrown when a file access operation fails.
    FileAlreadyExistsException
    Exception thrown when attempting to create a file that already exists.
    FileNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when an operation targets a file that does not exist.
    FileNotReadableException
    Exception thrown when a file cannot be read due to permission or format issues.
    FilePassword
     
    FileRepository
    Interface for file repository operations.
    FileService
    Singleton service class to handle file operations.
    HashException
    Exception thrown when a hashing operation fails.
    HashService
     
    IntegrityStore
    Stockage d'intégrité (IT2) : - Tous les fichiers d'intégrité sont dans .integrity/ (pas de miroir).
    IntegrityStore.IntegrityEntry
     
    InvalidCommandException
    Exception thrown when an invalid command is provided.
    Journalisation
     
    LocalFileRepository
    Local file system implementation of FileRepository.
    Main
    Entry point of the Secure File Manager application.
    MenuRenderer
    Singleton class to render menu and display messages to the Interface.
    SecureFile
    Represents a secure file with name and path information.
    UnknowException
    Exception thrown when an unknown error occurs.
    User
     
    UserService
    Service class for user authentication and management operations.
    ValueUtils
     
    WorkingContext
    Manages the working context (current directory) for file operations.
